name: ArchLinux Forums - Soft reading (berbae)
description:
It uses less bright white background where the eyes are more often focused in the Forums.
It is for a softer reading which doesn't strain the eyes.

This style is intended to be used only with the default Archlinux theme of the Forums.

Edit on July 30 2010 : for adjustments to the new FluxBB 1.4.1 look of the Forums.

Edit on August 04 2010 : Adjustments of colors in Main Site and Forums.

Edit on August 05 2010 : Fix a problem of visibility of focus lines
                         Alignment of status indicators

Edit on August 12 2010 : A small adjustment to the squared indicators of posts for a better alignment.

Edit on March 25 2011 : Change the background color of 'projects.archlinux.org' domain.

Edit on November 12 2012 : Added the 'aur.archlinux.org' domain.

Edit on February 15 2013 : Correct hovered on link color in Forum pages
